alert.note: Alert for Atkinson; Bacon; Coffee; Northern Ware (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 07 at 10:15PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southeastern Coffee, east central Atkinson, northern Ware and southwestern Bacon Counties through 1045 PM EDT... At 1015 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 6 miles south of Nicholls to 7 miles southwest of Pebble Hill to 7 miles southeast of Argyle. Movement was east at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds around 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Waycross, Boggy Bay, Pebble Hill, Manor, Dixie Union, Needham and Bickley. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
